title: Riot's best decision yet
body:

replies.body: you're welcome, fam
Does Riot have a Meme team? You deserve to head it. On a side note, how do I apply?

Would also apply.
Though i believe it would be called the cactopus meme patrol?
Plushie when?
Now we need Aurelion Swol

{{champion:497}} 
finally my smayash shrine is complete! xayah will lemme smash for sure!
So,um how do i get it?
ATM buy it on PBE for 1 BE. When it's released on live it will probably be with a bundle too.
Thanks
I want some bloody dark theme Icons already, I'm bored of this cuddly, cute weak icons.
Go back to your stinky Shadow Isles den, demon!
Wow, they actually saw the post!
Best decision they've made this season so far
This kind of comments the rioters respond... is so fun
I love aurelion smol but the lulu skin just isn't my cup of tea.
Is this on the PBE?
Riots best decision would be to bring s4 back
go to gameplay, you are not welcom in this board
